snippet.title: Virtual On: Cyber Troopers (Sega Saturn) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Here is some gameplay footage of the Sega Saturn game Virtual On.

I have had it for years, but unfortunately haven't gotten to put a whole lot of time into it, so if I look a little noobish in this vid, that's why.

The difficulty is set to normal.

I remember first playing this game at a demo station in my local Sears store, but I never knew the name of it, I just knew that I liked the game. It was one of my first Sega Saturn experienced (off of that demo). I also remember that Demo had Three Dirty Dwarves on it as well, and that was a blast.

Anyways, this is a very fun game. I mean, it's giant anime style mechs beating the piss out of each other. What more do you need?

This is from an era of great Sega Arcade games. It's a time we'll never have back unfortunately.
